component.description: LoadCommand provides a way to easily load all of the data required to render an application page.
component.attributes:
&widget_var_attribute;
name true java.lang.String Name of the javascript function generated from this markup.
error false java.lang.String String property containing an error message, if one occurs. Return null if no error.
oncomplete false java.lang.String Javascript to execute when the load is complete.
loadingMessage false java.lang.String Message to display when executing this load command.
loadingTheme false java.lang.String jQuery Mobile theme for the loader. Default is 'a'.
syncFieldsOverride false java.lang.String Name of an override function for the field synchronization. See Helix.DB.Utils.defaultFieldSync for method signature.
refineOverride false java.lang.String Name of an override function for array field synchronization. Used when a particular load command only synchronizes a portion of a database table.
cmd true javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Object cmd() A 0 argument command used to execute the load phase of the load command.
value true java.lang.Object Retrieve a serializeable object post load. Prior to load this should return an empty object that can be used to generate a template schema.
